feature.label: Concierge Tools for Eclipse
feature.description:
Concierge Tools for Eclipse provides basic design-time and run-time support for the Concierge OSGi framework. Concierge is a R3 OSGi implementation designed to be small and fast, and is ideal for resource constrained devices and applications. More information regarding Concierge, as well as source code, can be found at http://concierge.sourceforge.net/.
A binary form of Concierge is included as a part of these tools in the com.buglabs.osgi.concierge.runtime plugin.
